Docs.summary: Determines if the list of standard values returned from the method is an exclusive list.
Docs.returns: if the collection returned from is an exclusive list of possible values; otherwise, . The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the list is exclusive, no other values are valid, such as in an enumeration data type. If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values <xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter.FontNameConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> provides.
